F

FileHandling - Interface in <Unnamed>
Defines constants and abstract funtions to perform file operations in a C compatible manner.

Error codes
FileHandling.LseekOption - Enum in <Unnamed>

FileHandling.OpenOption - Enum in <Unnamed>

FileHandlingMaking - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface for a factory class the returns FileHandling instances.

Position relative to current position
FROM_END - FileHandling.LseekOption
Position relative to end of file
FROM_START - FileHandling.LseekOption

L
